txt.en: 'I have heard troubling reports from some of our warriors on the field, my friend. Men of unusual stature from Minas Morgul have seemingly taken strange beasts as slaves and seek to wield them against us. I know not whence these beasts come, but I heard rumours of such creatures from the Men of Rohan who passed through the forest of the Wild Men. Could the Men of Minas Morgul have found these within the Land of Shadow?\n\n'No matter their origin, we must repel these men and elimate these monsters before they can be used to turn the battle against us!'
What else lurks within the Morgul-host?
